narrative.title: Provider Overview
narrative.text: William Miller is a Counselor, Professional provider based in Norcross, GA. From 2018-01 through 2019-07, this provider received $242K in Medicaid payments across 3K claims serving 2K beneficiaries, billing 1 distinct procedure codes.

narrative.title: Key Findings
items: 100% of billing is concentrated in 90837 (90837), indicating significant specialization in this service.
Billing stopped in 2019-07, suggesting this provider is no longer active in Medicaid. Abrupt cessation of billing can be a risk indicator.
